lines.value: o lord our god arise scatter her enemies and make them fall confound their politics frustrate their knavish tricks on thee our hopes we fix god save us all

lines.value: thy choicest gifts in store on her be pleased to pour long may she reign may she defend our laws and ever give us cause to sing with heart and voice god save the queen
